document_data.name: Wand of Ghoul Touch
document_data.mainbody: '''''Wands of ghoul touch''''' were ghastly magic [[wand]]s that allowed the wielder to cast the ''[[ghoul touch]]'' spell.
document_data.Powers: ''Wands of ghoul touch'' held up to twenty five charges of the spell and could discharge it at will.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, ''wands of ghoul touch'' were used by the [[necromancer]]s of the [[Cult of the Dragon]] during their occupation of the ruins of [[Myth Drannor]]. The wands and their wielders were stationed in the [[Tower of Bones]] of [[Polyandrium]] with several wizards holding groun in [[Castle Cormanthor]].
